title: Why has 'YouTube Music' not taken off yet as a music streaming app? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simply because it’s a cheap ripoff of Spotify. Even apple music has a better position than Youtube Music. Youtube is trying to make everything based on success of other companies. Netflix started making their own movies? Youtube Red goes for that. Spotify is making millions from music? Let’s go for a music platform. Can’t wait for a youtube tik tok app.
